column4: anyone able to help out with a grub / boot issue after trying to install windows Failed
you need a natty disc to fix natty's grub
I could create a bootable natty USB stick using this livecd right?
is it possible to download and burn a cd while running from Live?
is it an automated process? ie - is there a repair option when I have that CD?
download the natty ISO load to a cd or thumb and follow this guide it defaults to loading grub2 from a live cd. https://help.ubuntu.com/community/Grub2#Copy%20LiveCD%20Files
3 commands one to confirm the HD set up=sudo fdisk -l then two more to load gryb.
whats the best way for me to create a bootable USB
while on livecd - I have the files and the USB drive ready to go
you downloaded the Natty ISO download unetbootin to load the thumb.  http://unetbootin.sourceforge.net/   I am going to assume that this will work on that old of a cd.
